title: Shortbread base banoffee pie
ingredients: ['For the caramel filling', '1 (397g) tin full cream condensed milk', 'For the base', '100g (4 oz) butter', '250g (9 oz) crushed good quality shortbread fingers', 'For the topping', '2 bananas', '1 (284ml) pot double cream, whipped', 'Flake bar, crumbled (to decorate)']
